title: Miami Memories
description: Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse address airplane etiquette, the importance of Hamilton, swear words and more! There's no explicit content in this one, but you may not want kids listening to it all the same.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
